Mark My Words Chrome Extension
Transform your feedback process with our Chrome extension that brings the power of Mark My Words directly into your browser. Built for teachers who want to give meaningful feedback efficiently, this extension seamlessly integrates skill tracking and annotation into your everyday workflow.

What You Can Do

Track Skills in Real Time
See exactly how students are progressing against your skill frameworks as you read their work. No more switching between windows or manually tracking progress – automatically map writing to your learning objectives, giving you instant insight into student development.

Smart Annotation That Makes Sense
Highlight text, add comments, and connect feedback to specific skills without leaving your browser. Use voice notes for faster feedback, or pull from your custom comment bank for common writing elements. Everything syncs back to your Mark My Words dashboard, keeping your feedback organised and accessible.

Draft Management That Works
Every revision matters. Track changes across multiple drafts with automatic version control that shows you exactly how students are improving, isolating the skills that are important on each phase of the assessment.

Visual Skill Mapping
See how different skills connect and build on each other with interactive skill trees. Spot where students are excelling and where they need support. Customise your skill hierarchies to match your curriculum and teaching approach.

For Teachers
- Save hours on grading without compromising quality
- Keep feedback consistent across assignments
- Get clear data for planning targeted instruction
- Focus on teaching, not paperwork
- Access everything in one place

For Students
- Receive focused feedback tied to specific skills
- See clear paths for improvement
- Get actionable suggestions
- Track their own progress over time

Quick Setup
Install directly from the Chrome Store, log in with your Mark My Words credentials, and you're ready to go. Set your preferences once, and the extension adapts to your teaching style.
